roles.desc: The roles associated with the control set.

status.desc: Specifies the current status of the control set.

systemEvidenceCount.desc: The total number of evidence objects retrieved automatically for the control set.

date.desc: The date when the first evidence was added to the evidence folder.

evidenceAwsServiceSourceCount.desc: The total number of AWS resources assessed to generate the evidence.

evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckCount.desc: The number of evidence that falls under the compliance check category. This evidence is collected from AWS Config or AWS Security Hub.

evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckIssuesCount.desc: The total number of issues that were reported directly from AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, or both.

evidenceByTypeConfigurationDataCount.desc: The number of evidence that falls under the configuration data category. This evidence is collected from configuration snapshots of other AWS services such as Amazon EC2, Amazon S3, or IAM.

evidenceByTypeManualCount.desc: The number of evidence that falls under the manual category. This evidence is imported manually.

evidenceByTypeUserActivityCount.desc: The number of evidence that falls under the user activity category. This evidence is collected from AWS CloudTrail logs.

evidenceResourcesIncludedCount.desc: The amount of evidence included in the evidence folder.

id.desc: The identifier for the folder in which evidence is stored.

name.length: Minimum length of 1. Maximum length of 300.
name.desc: The name of the specified evidence folder.

totalEvidence.desc: The total amount of evidence in the evidence folder.
